author: hgomez
msg: Documentations files from the current Tomcat 3.3.

author: costin
msg: Fixing SessionUtil for JDK1.1 compatibility, using the jdk compat package.
The fix is backported from 3.3 ( the difference is that 3.3 avoids static
methods - the fix has been adapted for 3.2 and SessionIdGenerator )

author: costin
msg: Adding the JDK compat package from 3.3.
This provide an clean mechanism to support JDK1.1, while taking advantage
of later JVMs without the pain of reflection or other hacks.
( it is not specific to JDK1.1 - it can provide JDK1.4 services while keeping
Adding this code shouldn't affect any piece of tomcat3.2 ( except the classes

author: costin
msg: Fix for case sensitive host lookup: the hostname is insensitive.
We use a small trick to avoid string creation in the common case
( domain names are lower case most of the time, so we use lower case )
